channel.title: General Bush Politics Annoying Youtube Olbermann Liberal Kieth on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in General Bush Politics Annoying Youtube Olbermann Liberal Kieth on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: Keith Olbermann is pretty awesome.
item.description: I am not a fan of the current administration. In fact you could say that I really despise the current leadership of the United States. It is frustrating and annoying. I get so angry that I stop reading the news. Then I get angry and I have to get caught up. Then I get angry from reading the news. Its a vicious vicious cycle. So anyway. A couple months ago I got rid of my cable.
